detectors.description:
Watermelon.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Watermelon.sol#33-42) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Watermelon.sol#35)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Watermelon.sol#36)
